traits.Lightfooted: The swashbuckler can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.
traits.Suave Defense: While the swashbuckler is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Charisma modifier.

actions.Multiattack: The swashbuckler makes three attacks: one with a dagger and two with its rapier.
actions.Dagger: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.Rapier: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
